com.constantcontact.util.http

Class HttpProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.constantcontact.util.http.HttpProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessorBase

    public class HttpProcessor
extends Object
implements ProcessorBase
    Low-level Class responsible with HTTP requests in Constant Contact.
    Outside has access only to HttpProcessor#makeHttpRequest(String, HttpMethod, ContentType, String, String)
    Author:
    ConstantContact

    • Nested Class Summary

      • makeHttpRequest

        public RawApiResponse makeHttpRequest(String urlParam,
                             ProcessorBase.HttpMethod httpMethod,
                             ProcessorBase.ContentType contentType,
                             String accessToken,
                             byte[] data)
        Makes a HTTP request to the Endpoint specified in urlParam and using the HTTP method specified by httpMethod.
        Parameters:
        urlParam - The URL of the resource, as a String
        httpMethod - The HttpMethod
        contentType - The request body's content type
        data - A String containing the data or NULL when there is no data to send (eg. in GET call).
        Returns:
        A RawApiResponse containing either the response data, or the error info otherwise.

      • extractHeaders

        protected Map<String,List<String>> extractHeaders(HttpURLConnection connection)

      • clientConnection

        protected HttpURLConnection clientConnection(String urlParam,
                                 ProcessorBase.HttpMethod httpMethod,
                                 String contentType,
                                 String accessToken,
                                 byte[] data)
                                      throws Exception
        Create the Connection to the Constant Contact endpoint.
        Parameters:
        urlParam - The exact URL to request.
        httpMethod - The ProcessorBase.HttpMethod specifying the HTTP Method to use (POST, GET, etc)
        contentType - The content type of the request body. Usually application/json
        Returns:
        The Connection object
        Throws:
        Exception - When something went wrong.

      • executeRequest

        protected String executeRequest(HttpURLConnection connection,
                    byte[] data)
        Sends the url request to the Constant Contact endpoint. Sends the associated data if any, and returns the server response.
        Parameters:
        connection -
        data -
        accessToken -
        Returns:
        server response
